titleStmt.title: The royal oake, or, An historicall description of the royal progresse, wonderful travels, miraculous escapes, and strange accidents of His Sacred Majesty Charles the II, third monarch of Great Britain wherein is observable and worth publique view ... / by John Danverd [sic]
titleStmt.author: Danvers, John.

editionStmt.edition: The fourth edition amplified and enlarged.

notesStmt.note: Other editions give name as John Danvers.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
